content:
<rule id="javax-to-jakarta-dependencies-00005" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="pom.xml" pattern="artifactId>javax.faces<"/>                  
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="org.glassfish javax.faces artifactId has been replaced by org.glassfish jakarta.faces">
                    <message>Replace the `javax.faces` artifactId with `jakarta.faces`</message>
                    <link href="https://jakarta.ee/" title="Jakarta EE"/>
                    <quickfix name="javax-to-jakarta-pom-dependencies-faces-a" type="REPLACE">
                           <replacement>jakarta</replacement>
                           <search>javax</search>
                    </quickfix>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
